amethyst@labyrinth.name: amethyst
amethyst@labyrinth.desc[0]: A large, beautifully polished amethyst has been put here.

casket@labyrinth.desc[1]: A large golden casket shines before you, glittering and sparkling.
casket@labyrinth.name: casket
casket@labyrinth.desc[2]: A large locked golden casket shines before you, glittering and sparkling.
casket@labyrinth.desc[0]: A large open golden casket shines before you, glittering and sparkling.

horn@labyrinth.name: horn
horn@labyrinth.desc[0]: An engraved silver horn has been carefully placed here.

mask@labyrinth.desc[1]:
On the center of the wall is a huge golden mask carved in the shape of a
horned demon.
mask@labyrinth.name: mask
mask@labyrinth.examine: The mask is pure gold, and probably very valuble.
mask@labyrinth.desc[0]: A stunning, horned, gold mask has been placed here.

s@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
s@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

c@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
c@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

h@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
h@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

p@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
p@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

j@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
j@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

lair@labyrinth.title: Minotaur's Lair
lair@labyrinth.description:
You stand in a huge chamber deep beneath the labyrinth.  The walls and
ceiling of the chamber are lined with the heads of those who failed to find
their way back from this legendary place and starved to death amid the maze.

end@labyrinth.title: The End of the Labyrinth
end@labyrinth.description:
...is something of an anti-climax after you have made it this far.  All it
apparently consists of is a hole in the ground which becomes a spiral staircase
after a while.

r@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
r@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

humm@labyrinth.title: Humm...
humm@labyrinth.description:
As you stand here a blanket of mist envelopes you.  The only ways out are to
grope upwards or downwards.

spiral3@labyrinth.title: Spiral Staircase
spiral3@labyrinth.description:
The staircase you are on ascends upwards into a blanket of mist or downwards
into a large labyrinth of columns, which, from your view point, appears to be
endless.

a@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
a@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

t@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
t@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

i@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
i@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

k@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
k@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

start@labyrinth.title: The Start of the Labyrinth
start@labyrinth.description:
...is a boring sort of place, the only exits being up a spiral staircase and
east into the Labyrinth.  The Labyrinth itself is composed of tall pillars in
the gloom.  There is a message scratched in the dirt here.  It says:

			B WA E O  HE M NO AUR

					M rt s

spiral@labyrinth.title: Spiral Staircase
spiral@labyrinth.description:
You are on a spiral staircase, and you are not far from the top of it.
Below you it is cold and gloomy, although not yet dark enough to need a light.

b@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
b@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

e@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

q@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
q@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

w@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
w@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

v@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
v@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

top@labyrinth.title: Top of Spiral Staircase
top@labyrinth.description:
You are standing at what is a carved spiral staircase descending down into
the gloom of below.  From down there come strange sounds, which you cannot
place.

end2@labyrinth.title: Spiral Stairs
end2@labyrinth.description:
You stand almost at the bottom of the stairs.  At the foot of the stairs is
a large room, half obscured by mist.  The walls are decorated with faces and
spectacular carvings of dying people.

o@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
o@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

d@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
d@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

spiral2@labyrinth.title: Spiral Staircase
spiral2@labyrinth.description:
You are on a spiral staircase which decends into a blanket of mist.  It
also (for the uninitiated in spiral staircase design) carries on upwards.

x@labyrinth.title: Labyrinth
x@labyrinth.description: You are lost in the labyrinth.

minotaur@labyrinth.name: minotaur
minotaur@labyrinth.description: A minotaur snarls viciously at you, his huge bulk shaking with rage.
